name: SURFboard®SmartHomeWi-FiManagement
0:
”Alexa, enable the guest Wi-Fi”
”Alexa, disable the guest Wi-Fi”
”Alexa, turn on the guest Wi-Fi”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
SURFboard® Smart Home Wi-Fi Management skill for Amazon Alexa enables users to manage and control select features on their SURFboard device with Alexa-powered voice commands (support may vary by product).

 • Ability enable/disable the guest Wi-Fi network feature (if available)

To get started, select "Enable Skill" button in Alexa App to link your SURFboard Account and discover your devices. Follow the steps to find account details at ( https://tinyurl.com/surfboard-alexa )

Find more information about connecting smart home devices at Connect a Smart Home Device to Alexa (http://tinyurl.com/alexa-smart-home).

To enable/disable Guest Wi-Fi, you can say the following, 

“Alexa, enable/ disable the guest Wi-Fi”
“Alexa, turn on/ off the guest Wi-Fi”

Currently supported on: SURFboard mAX Pro, SURFboard mAX Plus (W30), SURFboard mAX (W21)
